entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:16 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
